field.name: conference_name_en
field.param1: MoodleMoot Japan 2017

field.name: conference_name_ja
field.param1: 2017年度日本ムードル学会

field.name: conference_venue_en
field.param1: Jichi Medical University, JAPAN

field.name: conference_venue_ja
field.param1: 自治医科大学

field.name: conference_dates_en
field.description: 大会開催期間 Conference dates (en)
field.param1: Feb 17th - 19th, 2017

field.name: conference_dates_ja
field.description: 大会開催期間 Conference dates (ja)

field.name: name_title
field.param1: Dr. Mr. Ms. Prof.

field.name: name_given_en
field.description: 下の名前（ローマ字）Given name (en)

field.name: name_surname_en
field.description: 上の名前（ローマ字） Surname (en)

field.name: affiliation_state
field.description: 都道府県 State or Prefecture

field.name: email
field.description: Ｅメールアドレス Email address

field.name: name_title_2
field.param1: Dr. Mr. Ms. Prof.

field.name: name_given_2_en
field.description: 下の名前（ローマ字）Given name (en)

field.name: name_title_3
field.param1: Dr. Mr. Ms. Prof.

field.name: name_given_3_en
field.description: 下の名前（ローマ字）Given name (en)

field.name: name_title_4
field.param1: Dr. Mr. Ms. Prof.

field.name: name_given_4_en
field.description: 下の名前（ローマ字）Given name (en)

field.name: name_title_5
field.param1: Dr. Mr. Ms. Prof.

field.name: name_given_5_en
field.description: 下の名前（ローマ字）Given name (en)

field.name: presentation_handout_file
field.description: 資料のファイル Handout file

field.name: presentation_slides_file
field.description: スライドのファイル Presentation slides file

field.name: comments_questions
field.description: コメント・質問 Comments or questions

field.name: setdefaultvalues
field.description: 規定値設定 Set default values
field.param1: nametitle => name_title firstname => name_given_en lastname => name_surname_en firstnamephonetic => name_given_ja lastnamephonetic => name_surname_ja institution => affiliation_en department => affiliation_ja city => affiliation_state country => affiliation_country

field.name: fixdisabledfields
field.description: 不足値修正 Fix disabled fields

field.name: confirm_add_record
field.description: 新規登録確認 Confirm ADD record
field.param1: confirm
field.param4: Dear [[firstname]] [[lastname]], this email confirms that you have added a submission for [[conference_name_en]]. The submission details appear below. You can review and update this information online on the following URL: [[recordurl]] best regards [[conference_name_en]] committee ====================================== Submission details: ====================================== [[submission_details]]

field.name: confirm_update_record
field.description: 登録更新確認 Confirm UPDATE record
field.param1: confirm
field.param4: Dear [[firstname]] [[lastname]], this email confirms that you have updated your submission details for [[conference_name_en]]. The revised submission details appear below. You can review and update this information online on the following URL: [[recordurl]] best regards [[conference_name_en]] committee ====================================== Submission details: ====================================== [[submission_details]]

field.name: other_presenters
field.param1: [[IF name_given_2_en]] Co-presenter (2)共同研究者（２） : [[name_title_2]] [[name_given_2_en]] [[name_surname_2_en]] ([[affiliation_2_en]]) [[ENDIF]] [[IF name_given_3_en]] Co-presenter (3)共同研究者（３） : [[name_title_3]] [[name_given_3_en]] [[name_surname_3_en]] ([[affiliation_3_en]]) [[ENDIF]] [[IF name_given_4_en]] Co-presenter (4)共同研究者（４） : [[name_title_4]] [[name_given_4_en]] [[name_surname_4_en]] ([[affiliation_4_en]]) [[ENDIF]] [[IF name_given_5_en]] Co-presenter (5)共同研究者（５） : [[name_title_5]] [[name_given_5_en]] [[name_surname_5_en]] ([[affiliation_5_en]]) [[ENDIF]]

field.name: main_presenter
field.param1: [[IF name_title NOT_EMPTY]][[name_title]] [[ENDIF]][[IF name_given_en NOT_EMPTY]][[name_given_en]] [[ENDIF]][[IF name_surname_en NOT_EMPTY]][[name_surname_en]][[ENDIF]]

field.name: submission_details
field.param1:
SUBMISSION DETAILS
Title: [[presentation_title]]
Presentation type: [[presentation_type]]
Presentation language: [[presentation_language]]
Abstract: [[presentation_abstract]]
Topics: [[presentation_topics]]
Keywords: [[presentation_keywords]]
[[IF presentation_handout_file]]
Handout: [[presentation_handout_file]]
[[ENDIF]]
[[IF presentation_slides_file]]
Slides: [[presentation_slides_file]]
[[ENDIF]]
[[IF presentation_url]]
URL: [[presentation_url]]
[[ENDIF]]
MAIN PRESENTER
Name: [[IF name_title EMPTY]][[ELIF name_title START_WITH Mr]][[ELSE]][[name_title]][[ENDIF]]
[[name_given_en]] [[name_surname_en]] [[name_surname_ja]] [[name_given_ja]]
Affiliation: [[affiliation_en]]
Email: [[email]]
[[IF name_surname_2_en]]
CO-PRESENTERS:
(2) [[IF name_title_2 EMPTY]][[ELIF name_title_2 START_WITH Mr]][[ELSE]][[name_title_2]][[ENDIF]]
[[name_given_2_en]] [[name_surname_2_en]] [[affiliation_2_en]]
[[ENDIF]]
[[IF name_surname_3_en]]
(3) [[IF name_title_3 EMPTY]][[ELIF name_title_3 START_WITH Mr]][[ELSE]][[name_title_3]][[ENDIF]]
[[name_given_3_en]] [[name_surname_3_en]] [[affiliation_3_en]]
[[ENDIF]]
[[IF name_surname_4_en]]
(4) [[IF name_title_4 EMPTY]][[ELIF name_title_4 START_WITH Mr]][[ELSE]][[name_title_4]][[ENDIF]]
[[name_given_4_en]] [[name_surname_4_en]] [[affiliation_4_en]]
[[ENDIF]]
[[IF name_surname_5_en]]
(5) [[IF name_title_5 EMPTY]][[ELIF name_title_5 START_WITH Mr]][[ELSE]][[name_title_5]][[ENDIF]]
[[name_given_5_en]] [[name_surname_5_en]] [[affiliation_5_en]]
[[ENDIF]]

field.name: presentation_type
field.param1:
プレゼンテーション（９０分） Presentation (90 mins)
プレゼンテーション（４０分） Presentation (40 mins)
ケース・スタディー（２０分） Case study (20 mins)
ライトニング・トーク（１０分） Lightning talk (10 mins)
ショーケース（９０分） Showcase (90 mins)
ワークショップ（９０分） Workshop (90 mins)
商用プレゼンテーション（９０分） Commercial presentation (90 mins)
商用プレゼンテーション（４０分） Commercial presentation (40 mins)
商用ライトニング・トーク（１０分） Commercial lightning talk (10 mins)

field.name: presentation_topics
field.description: 発表のトピック Presentation topics
field.param1:
Moodleの利用 Using Moodle
Moodleの統合 Integrating Moodle
Moodleの開発 Moodle development
インストールと管理 Installation and Administration
学校でのMoodle導入事例 Moodle in traditional educational settings
学校以外の場所でのMoodle導入事例 Moodle in non-traditional settings
学生の観点 Students' perspectives
Moodleの教授法 Moodle Pedagogy

field.name: presentation_language
field.param1:
英語 English
日本語 Japanese

field.name: presentation_keywords
field.description: 発表のキーワード Presentation keywords

field.name: peer_review_link
field.description: 査読リンク Peer review link

field.name: peer_review_score
field.description: 査読評価 Peer review score

field.name: peer_review_details
field.description: 査読詳細 Peer review details

field.name: peer_review_notes
field.description: 査読メモ Peer review notes

field.name: peer_review_score_bgcolor
field.description: 査読評価背景色 Peer Review Score BG Color
field.param1: [[IF peer_review_score NUM_LESS_THAN 60]]#ff7373[[ELIF peer_review_score NUM_LESS_THAN 70]]#ffcc66[[ELIF peer_review_score NUM_LESS_THAN 80]]#ffff99[[ELSE]]#ccff99[[ENDIF]]

field.name: submission_rating
field.param1: [[recordrating]]

field.name: submission_url
field.param1: [[recordurl]]

field.name: submission_id
field.param1: [[recordid]]

field.name: submission_status
field.param1:
審査待ち Waiting for review
認められた Accepted
認められていない Not accepted
条件付きで認められた Conditionally accepted
キャンセルされた Cancelled

field.name: schedule_number
field.description: スケジュール番号 Schedule number

field.name: schedule_duration
field.param1:
10分 10 mins
20分 20 mins
25分 25 mins
30分 30 mins
40分 40 mins
50分 50 mins
60分 60 mins
75分 75 mins
80分 80 mins
90分 90 mins
120分 120 mins

field.name: schedule_day
field.param1:
２月１７日（金） Feb 17th (Fri)
２月１８日（土） Feb 18th (Sat)
２月１９日（日） Feb 19th (Sun)

field.name: schedule_time
field.description: 開催予定時刻 Schedule time

field.name: schedule_room
field.param1:
講堂（230席） Main Hall (230 seats)
大教室1（135席） Class Room L-1 (135 seats)
大教室2（135席） Class Room L-2 (135 seats)
大教室4（135席） Class Room L-4 (135 seats)
大教室5（135席） Class Room L-5 (135 seats)
中教室3（60席） Class Room M-3 (60 seats)
ERB (3F) Room M-3 (60 seats)
MB (6F) Class Room (50 seats)
MB (7F) Room L (30 seats)
MB (11F) PC Room (140 seats)

field.name: schedule_audience
field.param1:
開催室のみ Single room
大会参加者全員 All delegates

field.name: schedule_session
field.description: 開催予定行事 Schedule session
field.param1:
[[IF submission_status CONTAINS "認められた"]]
[[title]] [[presenters]] [[schedule_time]] ([[schedule_duration]]) [[schedule_room]]
[[ENDIF]]

field.name: schedule_presenters
field.param1:
[[IF name_surname_en NOT_EMPTY]][[TITLECASE name_surname_en]][[ENDIF]]
[[IF name_surname_2_en NOT_EMPTY]], [[TITLECASE name_surname_2_en]][[ENDIF]]
[[IF name_surname_3_en NOT_EMPTY]], [[TITLECASE name_surname_3_en]][[ENDIF]]
[[IF name_surname_4_en NOT_EMPTY]], [[TITLECASE name_surname_4_en]][[ENDIF]]
[[IF name_surname_5_en NOT_EMPTY]], [[TITLECASE name_surname_5_en]][[ENDIF]]

field.name: day_css_class
field.param1:
[[IF schedule_day CONTAINS "Fri"]]day1
[[ELIF schedule_day CONTAINS "Sat"]]day2
[[ELIF schedule_day CONTAINS "Sun"]]day3
[[ENDIF]]

field.name: time_css_class
field.param1:
[[IF schedule_time == "10:00"]]time1
[[ELIF schedule_time == "11:00"]]time2
[[ELIF schedule_time == "13:00"]]time3
[[ELIF schedule_time == "14:00"]]time4
[[ENDIF]]

field.name: room_css_class
field.param1:
[[IF schedule_room == "Room 495"]]room1
[[ELIF schedule_room == "Room 496"]]room2
[[ELIF schedule_room == "Room 497"]]room3
[[ELIF schedule_room == "Room 498"]]room4
[[ELIF schedule_room == "Room 499"]]room5
[[ELIF schedule_room == "Main Hall"]]room6
[[ENDIF]]

field.name: duration_css_class
field.param1:
[[IF schedule_duration == "10 mins"]]duration1
[[ELIF schedule_duration == "20 mins"]]duration2
[[ELIF schedule_duration == "40 mins"]]duration3
[[ELIF schedule_duration == "90 mins"]]duration4
[[ENDIF]]

field.name: audience_css_class
field.param1:
[[IF audience CONTAINS "Single room"]]audience1
[[ELIF audience CONTAINS "All delegates"]]audience2
[[ENDIF]]

field.name: type_css_class
field.param1:
[[IF presentation_type CONTAINS "Presentation"]]typepresentation
[[ELIF presentation_type CONTAINS "Case study"]]typecasestudy
[[ELIF presentation_type CONTAINS "Lightning talk"]]typelightningtalk
[[ELIF presentation_type CONTAINS "Showcase"]]typeshowcase
[[ELIF presentation_type CONTAINS "Workshop"]]typeworkshop
[[ENDIF]]
